definitions.definition: an educational institution or establishment, in particular.
one providing higher education or specialized professional or vocational training.
examples: my brother wanted to go to college

definitions.definition: (within a university) a school offering a general liberal arts curriculum leading only to a bachelor's degree.
(in Britain) any of a number of independent institutions within certain universities, each having its own teaching staff, students, and buildings.
the teaching staff and students of a college considered collectively.
examples: the college was shocked by his death

definitions.definition: an organized group of professional people with particular aims, duties, and privileges.
